summary: SummaryBuxom Power Line Lip Liner is a pigment-packed lip liner that provides ultra-precise results with a chiseled tip that never requires sharpening. The creamy, no-tug formula delivers comfortable, waterproof color that lasts for 8 hours to create fuller-looking lips that will not feather or bleed.
details: DetailsBenefitsFull-coverage, highly pigmented color that won't feather, tug, or bleed - Always-sharp, tear drop chisel tip for a precise, versatile applicationCreamy feel for lips that feel moisturized8-hour longwearWaterproofBuildableKey IngredientsSpecialized Peptides: Help promote a plump appearanceVitamin E: Helps soften and condition lipsSunflower Seed Oil: Known to help combat drynessAvocado Oil: Known to help hydrate skinFormulated WithoutParabens, Mineral Oil, PetroleumItem 2581838How To UseOutline lips with liner and use brush end to smooth, define or contour. Use the sharp point of the pencil for definition. Use the rounded part of the pencil to fill in lips. Use the brush to blend and smooth color.How to lip contour and highlight using two Power Line Lip LinersStep 1: Use a contour shade that either matches your lip's natural tone or deeper to outline lips and create an ''X'' at the cupid's bow.Step 2: Using the same contouring shade, fill in the outer corner on the top and bottom lip.Step 3: Apply a lighter shade than your lip's natural tone in the middle of the lip.Step 4: Blend both of the colors together with the built-in brush pulling the deeper shade towards the center of the lips and the lighter shade towards the outer corners of the mouth.Step 5: Wear alone for a matte, plumped look or top with gloss.This application can be replicated with any color combination of like-tones.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Outline lips with liner and use brush end to smooth, define or contour. Use the sharp point of the pencil for definition. Use the rounded part of the pencil to fill in lips. Use the brush to blend and smooth color.How to lip contour and highlight using two Power Line Lip LinersStep 1: Use a contour shade that either matches your lip's natural tone or deeper to outline lips and create an ''X'' at the cupid's bow.Step 2: Using the same contouring shade, fill in the outer corner on the top and bottom lip.Step 3: Apply a lighter shade than your lip's natural tone in the middle of the lip.Step 4: Blend both of the colors together with the built-in brush pulling the deeper shade towards the center of the lips and the lighter shade towards the outer corners of the mouth.Step 5: Wear alone for a matte, plumped look or top with gloss.This application can be replicated with any color combination of like-tones.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Lovely color and easy application.

reviews.headline: Best lip liner ever!
reviews.comments: This lip liner is one of the best ones I've ever found I love it and will become a staple my go-to forever I hope I don't run out

reviews.headline: Great all around item
reviews.comments: Love the neutral color, goes on smoothly, easy to correct

reviews.headline: I would not buy this products again
reviews.comments: I've noticed no plumping. The color is OK, but that's pretty much it

reviews.headline: Decent Lipliner
reviews.comments: This goes on pretty well and I like the angled tip.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this because of the brush and the advertised long wear. However, it was not darkskin friendly and the liner moves too much for me. IDK about the plumping effect . My lips are naturally full.

reviews.headline: Great lip liner
reviews.comments: This liner lasts, doesnt bleed , and is easy to apply

reviews.headline: Darling Dolly lipliner by Buxom
reviews.comments: The angled lip liner is easy to apply. It has staying power and is a beautiful color.  I do wish it would have more product in it. I have purchased other less expensive brands that  work as well with more product i.e. Maybelline and Revlon. However, this color is very special and I like it a lot.  The liner will break quickly if rolled up a little too far.

reviews.headline: Does not stay on long
reviews.comments: I found this lip liner to have nothing to do with plumping, so I'm surprised that's part of the product name to be honest. It was dry/chalky upon application - I used the brush on the other end to blend it in somewhat. I've used it both as a matte lip color and as a liner with sheer lipstick or gloss and did not stay on much past an hour or so. Sorry to say, but there are other lip liners out there that perform much better.

reviews.headline: Doesnt do anything
reviews.comments: It looks chalky when you put it on, doesnt not plump your lips at all. I have their lip gloss and i can see the difference, the lip liner is useless. Dont waste your money.

reviews.headline: Nice, but the color doesn't quite look like the pictures
reviews.comments: It feels smooth, does cling to some dry patches. (What lip liner doesn't?). The color just wasn't what i was expecting. See attached pictures for some non-filter images of the dangerous dolly.

reviews.headline: Loved the color butâ€¦.
reviews.comments: I wouldn't buy again, I didn't think it lasted that well for the couple times I used it. I was shocked when I realized there is like an inch of actual product in this liner.

reviews.headline: My 2nd Time Buying
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lip liner!  The staying power is there.  Goes on nice and smooth and looks great paired with the buxom lip gloss.  A must buy!

reviews.headline: not enough product
reviews.comments: Ther must have been 1/4 inch of product in it since it hit bottom too fast.  BTW..............this wasn't the only pencil I use.  I have 8 others that still have product that I bought months before.

reviews.headline: I like the product
reviews.comments: Two days into using it, the product was stuck in the lid and wouldn't come out without making a mess. I was able to stick it back into the tube but wasted some product. Disappointed.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love stays put

reviews.headline: my fave liner ever
reviews.comments: the shades are unmatched and hi def honey is my favorite liner ever and i looooove that it plumps.

reviews.headline: Would by again
reviews.comments: Love the color

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: All got stuck inside cover. Can't be used.

reviews.headline: Terrible product
reviews.comments: Very disappointed that prior pencil was discontinued.   This version does not have staying power and is a waste of money.  Does not last eight hours as advertised.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received the Power Line Plumping Lip Liner Dolly by Buxom Cosmetics from BuzzAgent in exchange for my honest feedback in a review. The first thing that I noticed about the product was the mauve color! It's very similar to a natural lip color, except better. The lip crayon-type pencil didn't tug on my lips at all, which was fantastic because that is one thing that will cause me to switch brands. I really like that I don't need to sharpen it because that is very inconvenient at times, especially when you've tried pencils such as this one where you don't need to sharpen. It gives you a nice pouty look, which is fantastic! The other end of the pencil has a blending brush sponge to help blend and fill, which I really like. The color seems to last for several hours before needing to be reapplied. Since it is waterproof, there was no transferring, which is one of my pet peeves! One of the things that I love most about this lip liner is that it is free of parabens, mineral oil, and petroleum. I try my best to use products that have clean ingredients, so this liner was right up my alley.Â 

I feel as though the asking price is a tad high, but not too high for something I personally would not purchase. I didn't notice my lips being any plumper than before using it. If I could change something about this product, it would be the size of the pencil tip. I tend to go for smaller tip lip liners, and this one was a little too large for my liking. This lip liner goes on smooth and stays put for almost the entire day, unlike some other liners I have used in the past, which is awesome! The dual-sided brush and lip liner are very beneficial for someone who just wants to carry a minimal amount of products for their lips. You can replace your lipstick and just use the brush side!

Overall, I liked it and would probably buy it! I would recommend this to family and friends because this is a good product!
faceoff_positive.headline: Very pretty!

faceoff_negative.comments: I received the BUXOM COSMETICS Power Line Plumping Lip Liner from BzzAgent and I've never tried Buxom cosmetics before. First off the packaging is nice and simple. Nothing too fancy. Straight to the point sort of package. The color I received is Dangerous Dolly. And I love the color. It's super cute, not too dark not too light. You can wear it everyday for work, home, church. Secondly, the dual end brush sort of through me in a loop as I have never tried such a product like this. I was a bit sketchy at first but after trying it I have to say it was really nice. It smooths out the liner very nicely and softly over your lips making them look like you added some lipstick.  The quality of this lip liner is just wonderful all around. However the downside was that the plumping effect.......I don't see it. So if you are looking for a plumping effect like tingling this is not the Lippy for you. If you want to only carry 1 product with you for your lips and not 2 such as lipstick AND the liner then this is your gal! Overall I was pleased with the liner and the choice of color selected for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: No plump BUT wonderful color
